title: Mahou Shoujo? Naria☆Girls
alternative_title: 魔法少女? なりあ☆がーるず
description: Urara, Hanabi, and Inaho are three girls who aim to become nationally-renowned characters by creating animation of themselves! They chose the magical girl theme to catch the attention of everyone from children to adults! Can they safely become popular characters in a one-cours magical girl anime?
